tool_description: Maps grant budget requirements and restrictions to project financial needs, identifying allowable costs, budget category constraints, and cost-sharing requirements from funder guidelines.

grant_guidelines_url.description: URL to grant budget guidelines document

project_budget_estimate.description: Total estimated project budget in USD

cost_categories.description: List of project cost categories (personnel, equipment, travel, etc.)

cost_amounts.description: Corresponding amounts for each cost category

organization_type.description: Type of applicant organization: nonprofit, university, government, or commercial

indirect_rate.description: Organization's indirect cost rate as percentage

error_messages: Guidelines not accessible: Cannot access budget guidelines at the provided URL.
Budget category mismatch: cost_categories and cost_amounts arrays must have equal length.
Invalid organization type: organization_type must be one of [nonprofit, university, government, commercial].
Negative amounts: All cost amounts must be positive numbers.
Invalid indirect rate: indirect_rate must be between 0 and 100 if provided.
Budget exceeds limits: Project budget exceeds maximum allowable amount for this grant.
usage: Provide grant_guidelines_url, project_budget_estimate, cost_categories, cost_amounts, and organization_type. Optionally include indirect_rate for complete analysis.

budget_compliance.description: Whether project budget complies with grant requirements

allowable_costs.description: List of costs allowed under grant guidelines

restricted_costs.description: List of costs not allowed or restricted

cost_sharing_required.description: Whether cost sharing/matching funds are required

cost_sharing_percentage.description: Required cost sharing percentage if applicable
